dcterms:creator: I. Guyon
L. Schomaker
R. Plamondon
M. Liberman
S. Janet
dcterms:description: Unipen is comprised of several subsets, including Unipen 1a (digits, 10 classes, 7,562 samples), Unipen 1b (upper-case alphabet, 26 classes, 6,039 samples), and Unipen 1c (lowercase alphabet, 26 classes, 10,712 samples). Each sample is a sequence of 2D pen-tip coordinate vectors.
dcterms:title: Unipen

dcterms:creator: Y. Chen
E. Keogh
B. Hu
N. Begum
A. Bagnall
A. Mueen
G. Batista
dcterms:description: The UCR Time Series Classification Archive is a famous benchmark that comprises 85 different univariate time series datasets. The authors selected 52 datasets for their experiments, ensuring that each dataset had more than 100 training samples.
dcterms:title: University of California Riverside (UCR)

dcterms:creator: J. Ortega-Garcia
et al.
dcterms:description: MCYT-100 is a bimodal biometric database containing 100 subjects, each with 25 genuine signatures and 25 skilled forgeries. Each signature has five channels: 2D coordinates, pressure, azimuth, and altitude angles of the pen tip.
dcterms:title: MCYT-100
